title: Kdp Keyword Research Step By Step - A TIME TESTED Method to Find Low Competition Keywords✨

tactics.name: Amazon Search Suggestions
tactics.description: Use Amazon's search bar with extensions to gather keyword variations for niche topics.
steps: Install Ultimate Amazon Search Suggestion Expander
Export keyword lists from Amazon and Keyword.io
source_quotes: 'every keyword that has more than 1000 search results should be avoided'

tactics.name: ASIN Reverse Lookup
tactics.description: Analyze competitor books using ASINs to extract keyword data.
steps: Find top-ranking ASINs from Amazon search results
Use Helium 10's reverse ASIN lookup tool
Export keyword lists for niche analysis
source_quotes: 'selected the very top listed or top ranking book'

tactics.name: Keyword Aggregation & Validation
tactics.description: Combine keywords from Amazon search, keyword.io, and Helium 10 using ASIN reverse lookup to create a comprehensive keyword list, then validate against search volume thresholds.
steps: Export keywords from Helium 10, keyword.io, and Amazon search
Remove duplicates using Excel data tools
Validate keywords by checking Amazon search results (max 1000 results)
Use conditional formatting to highlight keywords under 1000 results
source_quotes: 'the keyword should have should have a 1000 results at max'

tactics.name: Reverse Lookup for Bestsellers
tactics.description: Use reverse lookup on top-ranking books to identify keywords, then validate their performance on Amazon.
steps: Search for reverse lookup of top-ranking books
Validate keywords on Amazon.com across categories
caveats: Fails when no data exists for keywords
source_quotes: make a huge list of keywords and then validate on amazon.com in all categories that is all the idea for keyword research

heuristics.name: Low-Volume Keyword Prioritization
heuristics.condition: If search volume is less than 1000, prioritize keyword
source_quotes: 'focusing on the keyword that has less than 1000 amazon search results'

heuristics.name: Low Competition Boost
heuristics.condition: If search volume is less than 1000, prioritize keyword
source_quotes: 'format rules if it is less than less than or equal to 1000 then its color should be green'

heuristics.name: Review Count Threshold
heuristics.condition: If median_reviews is less than 200, boost keyword
source_quotes: validate on amazon.com in all categories

claims.statement: Free tools can generate keyword lists for KDP research
Keywords with under 1000 Amazon search results are considered low competition
source_quotes: 'the keyword should have should have a 1000 results at max'

claims.statement: Keyword research is simple and easy to do if it takes time
source_quotes: this is very simple to do and very easy to do if it do takes time

niche_patterns.example: accounting ledger + low competition + free tools
niche_patterns.description: Target specific niches with constrained keyword availability
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines niche identity with low-competition search volume
